name: Link
description: An accessible link component for navigation within the application or to external resources

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a link with the link's text content. External links are announced with additional context indicating they open in a new tab.

recommendedUsage: Use for navigation to other pages or sections. Choose external=true for links that leave the current site.
antiPatterns: Do not use links for actions that don't navigate (use Button instead). Avoid links styled as buttons or buttons styled as links. Avoid icon-only links without accessible text.
